# Voidspace — NEAR Ecosystem Intelligence

> AI-powered ecosystem intelligence tool for the NEAR Protocol blockchain. Find market gaps ("voids"), explore the ecosystem, learn to build on NEAR, and discover opportunities.

Voidspace helps developers, founders, and researchers understand the NEAR Protocol ecosystem through data-driven analysis and interactive tools.

## Key Pages

- [Home](https://voidspace.io): Overview of Voidspace and the NEAR ecosystem
- [Observatory](https://voidspace.io/observatory): Unified dashboard for ecosystem analysis tools (Void Lens, Constellation Map, Pulse Streams)
- [Ecosystem](https://voidspace.io/ecosystem): Browse and explore NEAR ecosystem projects by category
- [Categories](https://voidspace.io/categories): 20 ecosystem categories covering DeFi, NFTs, Gaming, Infrastructure, DAOs, and more
- [Sanctum](https://voidspace.io/sanctum): Build and deploy smart contracts on NEAR with guided templates
- [Opportunities](https://voidspace.io/opportunities): Real-time ecosystem opportunities and market gaps
- [Learn](https://voidspace.io/learn): Comprehensive NEAR development learning platform with 43 modules across 4 tracks

## Learning Tracks

- [Explorer Track](https://voidspace.io/learn): 11 modules — blockchain basics, NEAR fundamentals, wallets, dApps, DeFi
- [Builder Track](https://voidspace.io/learn): 16 modules — Rust, smart contracts, testing, deployment, token standards
- [Hacker Track](https://voidspace.io/learn): 11 modules — advanced architecture, cross-contract calls, chain signatures, AI agents
- [Founder Track](https://voidspace.io/learn): 5 modules — grants, tokenomics, building in public, pitching, revenue models

## Deep Dive Articles

- [Rust for Blockchain Development](https://voidspace.io/learn/rust-for-blockchain): Why Rust is the language of choice for blockchain
- [Solana vs NEAR](https://voidspace.io/learn/solana-vs-near): Technical comparison of two major Rust-based L1 blockchains
- [For Solana Developers](https://voidspace.io/learn/for-solana-developers): Migration guide from Solana to NEAR
- [NEAR Key Technologies](https://voidspace.io/learn/key-technologies): Nightshade sharding, Aurora, Rainbow Bridge, chain abstraction
- [Why Rust for NEAR](https://voidspace.io/learn/why-rust): Rust's role in NEAR smart contract development
- [Wallet Setup Guide](https://voidspace.io/learn/wallet-setup): How to create and manage a NEAR wallet
- [Rust Curriculum](https://voidspace.io/learn/rust-curriculum): Structured path to learning Rust for NEAR development
- [Quick Start](https://voidspace.io/learn/quick-start): Get started with NEAR development in minutes

## Tools

- **Void Lens**: AI-powered gap analysis — identifies underserved niches in the NEAR ecosystem
- **Constellation Map**: Interactive visualization of ecosystem project relationships
- **Pulse Streams**: Real-time activity feeds and trending metrics across the ecosystem

## About

Voidspace is built for the NEAR Protocol ecosystem. NEAR is a layer-1 blockchain using Nightshade sharding, with human-readable account names, ~1 second finality, and sub-cent transaction fees. Voidspace provides intelligence and education tools to help builders find and fill gaps in this ecosystem.

## Full Documentation

For detailed content about all pages: [llms-full.txt](https://voidspace.io/llms-full.txt)
